header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Full-stack software engineer with 5+ years building scalable, mission-critical systems handling large-scale data processing and financial transactions. Proven expertise in cloud infrastructure, event-driven architectures, and designing systems with strong data integrity guarantees. Experience implementing comprehensive validation pipelines, audit trails, and fault-tolerant architectures that maintain reliability under high load. AWS certified with entrepreneurial mindset from blockchain startup experience. Passionate about building robust data systems and secure payment infrastructure.

experience.title: Software Engineer II

Architected state management systems handling critical content metadata for all Disney+ and Hulu television, movie, and sports content with zero-downtime requirements
Developed comprehensive schema registry and validation pipelines ensuring data compatibility across distributed systems, preventing costly production failures
Implemented multi-language artifact generation (Scala, Java, Python) with Protobuf serialization for cross-platform compatibility
Built real-time data lake integration using Spark, Databricks, and S3 with Parquet/Deltalake format for analytics and performance monitoring
Collaborated closely with product development teams to support the delivery of seamless user experiences across the full technology stack
